Flow.description: 翌月以降前納合計額税区分削除

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM1
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_1}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_1})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_1})), IF({!var_GarageCertification.IssueCharges__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_1} ,"","発行手数料の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_GarageCertification.IssueCharges__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_1}+{!input_AmountCM2_1}) ,"","発行手数料の合計金額が正しくありません。")))

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM2
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_2}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_2})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_2})), IF({!var_GarageCertification.OtherAmount1__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_2} ,"",{!var_GarageCertification.OtherFields1__c} & "の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_GarageCertification.OtherAmount1__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_2}+{!input_AmountCM2_2}) ,"",{!var_GarageCertification.OtherFields1__c} & "の合計金額が正しくありません。")))

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM3
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_3}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_3})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_3})), IF({!var_GarageCertification.OtherAmount2__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_3} ,"",{!var_GarageCertification.OtherFields2__c} & "の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_GarageCertification.OtherAmount2__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_3}+{!input_AmountCM2_3}) ,"",{!var_GarageCertification.OtherFields2__c} & "の合計金額が正しくありません。")))

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM4
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_4}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_4})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_4})), IF({!var_GarageCertification.ThisMonthPaymentParkingFee__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_4} ,"","当月支払駐車場代の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_GarageCertification.ThisMonthPaymentParkingFee__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_4}+{!input_AmountCM2_4}) ,"","当月支払駐車場代の合計金額が正しくありません。")))

formulas.name: formula_ErrorMessageCM5
formulas.expression: IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM1_5}),ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_5})),"", IF(AND(ISBLANK({!input_AmountCM2_5})), IF({!var_GarageCertification.NextMonthPaymentParkingFee__c} = {!input_AmountCM1_5} ,"","当月支払駐車場代の合計金額が正しくありません。"), IF({!var_GarageCertification.NextMonthPaymentParkingFee__c} = ({!input_AmountCM1_5}+{!input_AmountCM2_5}) ,"","当月支払駐車場代の合計金額が正しくありません。")))

formulas.name: formula_NextMonthPaymentExpenseItemsName
formulas.expression: IF (MONTH({!get_GarageCertification.ParkingFeePaymentStartDate__c}) = 12 , TEXT(YEAR({!get_GarageCertification.ParkingFeePaymentStartDate__c})+1) & "年1月分駐車場代", TEXT(YEAR({!get_GarageCertification.ParkingFeePaymentStartDate__c})) & "年" & TEXT(MONTH({!get_GarageCertification.ParkingFeePaymentStartDate__c})+1) & "月分駐車場代" )
